definitions.definition: To leave ( anything that depends on one's presence to survive , exist , or succeed ), especially when contrary to a promise or obligation ; to abandon ; to forsake .
examples: You can't just drive off and desert me here, in the middle of nowhere.

definitions.definition: To leave one's duty or post, especially to leave a military or naval unit without permission.
examples: Anyone found deserting will be punished.

main_definition: To leave ( anything that depends on one's presence to survive , exist , or succeed ), especially when contrary to a promise or obligation ; to abandon ; to forsake .
secondary_definitions: To leave one's duty or post, especially to leave a military or naval unit without permission.
